column1: Loosen your muscles with a foam roller.
Drink a full glass of water.
Cross off yesterday from your calendar.
Read a blog post or article.
Learn and absorb one to three new things.
Strike up a conversation with a stranger.
Do your most important task first.
Work on a side hustle or business idea.
Do one or two small marketing actions.
Open the curtains and welcome the day.
Take your dog for a walk.
